definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

sentences.english: Phosphated bodies should be uniformly wet or dry when they enter the phosphate bath.
sentences.chinese: 磷化過的車身必須全溼或全乾狀態進入電泳槽。

sentences.english: This system assuring the integration of CIMS information in autobody development.
sentences.chinese: 該系統保證了車身開發中CIMS的信息集成。

sentences.english: Going slower and slower in the lane, my car was almost sticking to the cliff.
sentences.chinese: 車在通道上越走越慢，車身快要貼住峭壁了。

sentences.english: It was powder blue and sleek[1] looking.The kind of car you dream about.
sentences.chinese: 粉藍色的車身閃着光芒，絕對是人們夢寐以求的車。

sentences.english: Unscrew threaded joint securing transmission cross member to body.
sentences.chinese: 擰下將變速器橫樑固定到車身的螺紋接頭。

sentences.english: Functions which when disturbed affect vehicle statutory data: e. g. tachograph, odometer.
sentences.chinese: 與車輛車身數據有關的，例如行駛記錄表，里程錶。

sentences.english: Tires, the engine, the body, and the seats are component of a car.
sentences.chinese: 輪胎，引擎，車身以及坐椅都是一輛汽車的零部件。

sentences.english: Gifted automobile body is more wide and abound the exterior that force feels.
sentences.chinese: 賦予了車身更加寬大而富於力量感的外觀。

sentences.english: The aerodynamics and the design are absolutely crazy.
sentences.chinese: 車身對空氣動力學的運用以及外觀的設計絕對瘋狂。

sentences.english: It is difficult to design triangle surface in autobody styling.
sentences.chinese: 三角域曲面沒計一直是車身表面造型的難點。

sentences.english: All new bodywork does more than add break-away-from-the-crowd styling.
sentences.chinese: 所有新的車身不超過購買脫離從，在觀衆風格。

sentences.english: Main dock is one of the key parts of car body welding producing line.
sentences.chinese: 合裝臺是汽車車身焊裝過程中的關鍵設備。

sentences.english: Tires- the engine- the body- and the seats are component of a vehicular.
sentences.chinese: 輪胎，引擎，車身以及坐椅都是一輛汽車的零部件。

sentences.english: Flanking its long body are two outrigger treads that allow the tank to turn.
sentences.chinese: 兩條外架式履帶在狹長的車身兩側，幫助坦克轉向。

sentences.english: The utility model further relates to a vehicle-body conveying system using the above method.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型還涉及一種使用上述方法的車身輸送系統。

sentences.english: These huge presses mould the car bodies.
sentences.chinese: 這些巨大的壓牀模壓出汽車車身。
